ModMetaData.name: 4M Mehni's Misc Modifications
ModMetaData.author: Mehni
ModMetaData.description:
v0.1.2.0\n\n Adds various settings to customise your RimWorld experience.
Current features include: - Bugfixes for vanilla issues - Extend the time for pawns to undraft themselves - Change the threshold at which pawns retreat - Extend the time before you get kicked out of caravan maps - Never roll pacifists again - Confirmation dialog before starting if currently viewed colonist isn't selected for embark - Show more info on plant yield (Thanks XeoNovaDan!) - Show what pawns are in a relationship when assigning beds - Disable messages for dying animals - who cares about Chicken #357 dying? - Various (AI) tweaks and settings (custom filth rate, don't interact with animals before bedtime) - Mods for modders. Remove the 6 second cooldown on workshop submissions - Show DPS info on all (modded) weapons (Thanks XeoNovaDan!) - Devmode spawn tweaks - Alert when the NPD can't be used
